title: Nintendo Direct Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.17.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.

Go listen to A Better Paradise today, and don't forget to follow it on your platform of choice to make sure you never miss an episode!

Greg and Blessing kick off the week by talking about the Nintendo Direct coming tomorrow and more!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:24 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - GAMESCAST is our Nintendo Direct predictions
     - The STREAM is Elden Ring with Mike, Nick, and Andy
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway which is “I wish I was a Nintendo kid”
     - And you can get the Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
              -   The Roper Report   -
00:11:04 - Nintendo Direct Announced for Tomorrow, With 40 Minutes of Switch Games Coming Out Later This Year
00:34:34 - Sony Teases Quentin Tarantino’s Final Film, The Beatles Movies and Live-Action Zelda at CineEurope Presentation (also the next Uncharted)
00:41:05 - Embracer Shuts Down Alone in the Dark Developer Pieces Interactive
00:48:59 - Wizard With a Gun developer Galvanic Games is closing down
00:54:48 - Bethesda won’t rush Fallout 5, Todd Howard says
00:58:06 - A Quiet Place game is coming later this year
01:01:31 - Wee News!
01:04:32 - You‘re Wrong
